name: Let there NOT be Chaos (daniFM)
description:
Let there NOT be Chaos

This game is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Someone has arranged the conveyor belts in the worst possible way. No boxes can enter the booths this way!

Hopefully you can figure it out how to place the boxes in their place using the remote, specially the color ones!

Known issues
  • Threre's a bug that let you win by getting more than one box of the same color inside its bin.
  • Performance can have an impact on the physics and how the boxes move in the conveyor belts.
